headers.value: camera=(), microphone=(), geolocation=(), payment=(), usb=(), magnetometer=(), gyroscope=(), accelerometer=(), autoplay=(), encrypted-media=(), fullscreen=(self), picture-in-picture=(), sync-xhr=(), midi=(), idle-detection=(), keyboard-map=()

default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https://whop.com https://*.whop.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://whop.com https://*.whop.com; img-src 'self' data: https: blob:; font-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https://api.whop.com https://*.whop.com https://segapi.whop.com; frame-ancestors 'self' https://whop.com https://*.whop.com; frame-src 'self' https://whop.com https://*.whop.com
